# Lyle Ventures — llms.txt

> Venture capital for creators and builders at the technology frontier.

## Overview

Lyle Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm founded by Ethan Lyle. We invest in technical founders building foundational infrastructure across six frontier technology sectors.

## Founder

**Ethan Lyle**
- Founder & Managing Partner
- Email: ethan@lyle-ventures.xyz
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ethanlyle/
- Background: Harvard College (Government), Harvard Kennedy School (MPP), Columbia Business School (MBA)
- Prior experience: Teneo, Kekst CNC, Wachsman, Obama 2008 campaign

## Investment Focus

### Stage
- Pre-Seed
- Seed
- Series A

### Check Size
$250K – $2M

### Sectors

1. **Artificial Intelligence (AI)** — Machine learning, foundation models, AI infrastructure, applied AI
2. **Crypto & Blockchain** — DeFi, infrastructure, gaming, tokenization
3. **Defense Technology** — Dual-use technologies, autonomous systems, cybersecurity
4. **Education Technology** — Learning platforms, credentialing, workforce development
5. **Energy** — Nuclear, fusion, grid infrastructure, clean energy
6. **Biomedical & Health** — Longevity, diagnostics, therapeutics, health infrastructure

## Portfolio Companies

- **SVRN** (Biomedical) — Accelerating biomedical innovation
- **Valley Arcade** (Crypto) — Blockchain gaming via physical arcade cabinets
- **Phoenix Fund** (Education) — VC backing Harvard's top founders
- **EloraHQ** (AI) — AI-powered care assistant
- **Stealth** (Energy) — Nuclear energy project
- **Mearas** (Defense) — Electric off-road vehicles for civilian and military use

## Investment Criteria

We look for:
- Technical founders with deep domain expertise
- Clear insight into an underserved market
- Long-term tenacity and ability to outlast market cycles
- Products that solve hard problems others avoid

## Contact

**For founders seeking investment:**
Email: ethan@lyle-ventures.xyz

Include:
- Brief background on you and your team
- What you're building and the problem you're solving
- Why now, and why you
- Current stage and what you're raising
- Deck or demo (if available)

## Website
https://lyle-ventures.xyz
